# The `MCAsmLexer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Generic assembler lexer interface, for use by target specific assembly lexers.

Definition at line 37 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcparser/mcasmlexer-h">MCAsmLexer.h</a>.

### getTok() {#aacd3bad41979d112344478f44007a551}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const AsmToken &amp; llvm::MCAsmLexer::getTok () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
